message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I think you'll find valuable. I believe it's worth $10,000, but I'm willing to start the negotiations at $9,500. What do you think?

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,000?
Bob, I appreciate you making an offer.  While $9,000 is tempting, I can't go that low.  Would you consider $9,250?  I believe that's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $9,250. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9,100. Would you be willing to meet me there?
